author: Alex Ballentine
title: 2020 NBA Free Agency: Predictions for Anthony Davis, Top Potential Free Agents
description: Much like the 2020 draft class, the 2020  NBA  free agency class is short on superstars. However, in the quest to build a championship contender every step is important and the contracts given out this offseason will still shape the title race...
content:
